title: Gabe Newell and the Steam Team

embed.description: ►http://www.patreon.com/crazyboris ►https://www.facebook.com/crazyborisproduction ►http://www.crazyboris.com ►https://www.twitter.com/crazy_boris ►http://www.twitch.tv/crazy_boris/ This is a work of satire. All logos depicted belong to their respective owners. This video does not represent the opinions of the individuals depicted. That said, Todd Howard could probably take on a T-Rex. Also, that brief Japanese text is supposed to be "unchained" but I dunno Google Translate am I right.

body:
Video caricato da [Crazy Boris Productions](https://www.youtube.com/user/CrazyBorisProduction).

Sì, è lo stesso di [Can't Killean the {{champion:26}}](https://youtu.be/Xpe-JoGyPsY).
